title:
IN THE 40\'S AND 50\'S THERE WAS A RESTURANT LOCATED on front street BETWEEN GRACE AND 

CHESTNUT ST. ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE 

STREET ACROSS FROM THE ENTERENCE OF H. L.

GREENS DIME STORE OR NEXT TO J. C. PENNYS I CAN\'T REMEMBER EXACTLY.



IT WAS KNOWN FOR HAVEING A GREAT SPAGHETTI DISH. WHAT WAS THE NAME OF THIS RESTURANT.



THANK\'S FOR YOUR HELP.
text: Hello. It took us a while, but here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=19277
